about_the_game:
Welcome to "Empire of Elegance", an immersive hotel simulation game that offers you the chance to build and manage your very own hotel empire. From a modest bed-and-breakfast to a five-star luxury resort, your journey to becoming the ultimate hotelier starts here.

In this game, you'll have the opportunity to construct and design every aspect of your hotel. Choose from a variety of room types, restaurants, leisure facilities, and décor to craft the perfect environment that appeals to all sorts of guests, from budget-minded travelers to high-rolling VIPs.

But building the hotel is just the first step. You'll need to hire and manage staff, set competitive pricing strategies, maintain guest satisfaction, and navigate through various challenges and events. Balancing finances, guest needs, staff morale, and hotel reputation will test your strategic decision-making skills.

Key Features:

Dynamic Building System: Design and construct your dream hotel from the ground up.
Staff Management: Hire, train, and manage your team, ensuring they deliver top-notch service to your guests.
Guest AI: Cater to the unique needs of a diverse range of guests. Their satisfaction will directly impact your hotel's reputation and revenue.
Economic Simulation: Set your pricing strategies and manage your hotel's finances to ensure sustainable growth.
Event Challenges: Face various events and challenges that will test your problem-solving skills.
"Empire of Elegance" provides a captivating blend of strategy, management, and creativity. Whether you're a seasoned tycoon or new to simulation games, "Empire of Elegance" offers a compelling experience that's sure to keep you engaged.

So, are you ready to build your Empire of Elegance? Book your journey into the world of hotel management today!

name: Hotel Simulator 2024

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor/Ryzen 1700+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Hotel Simulaton is your chance to build and run a hotel empire. Design your hotel, manage staff, satisfy diverse guests, and set winning strategies. This simulation game blends creativity, strategy, and management in an immersive hotelier journey.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Turkish
